chapters.title: Chapter 22:  To Make an Anchor Weep
chapters.info:
Shalon din Togara Morning Tide,
      p. 463â€”Windfinder of Clan Shodein.  She was left under a bed, bound
      with the Power and shielded, by Rand, in
      the middle of the attack by the Asha'man.
      She has not been seen since.
      See also
